author: adewit
body:
#### PR description:

This adds the HTXS stage 1.2 classification, keeping stage 1.1, 1 and 0 available 

#### PR validation:

Verified to run correctly using runRivetHTXS_cfg.py

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

backport of #28444 , needed for nanoAOD
title: Adding HTXS stage 1.2 classification (106X backport)
